data.message: Tears! Hopefully object recognition technology will expand so that the artist  could describe what they made, even the details. I'm so excited to see where this could go! Great work FB!

replies.message: That would be awesome if there was an option when I post a picture for me to put some descriptive words in ....maybe an extension of what facebook adds.....this is amazing!
Yes exactly! My husband creates mixed media art. If he could describe the work, that would be SO cool!!!

Since FB has names to go with many of the pictures that are on FB it would be really wonderful if they would include those names in the description.  Also, those awful so called pictures that are really just cute sayings people keep putting up... It would be nice if either FB could read out the words, or else indicate that it is a picture of words.  That way I wouldn't have to keep getting family to look at the picture, only to find that it is a silly saying in picture format.  What a waste of time.  Can't wait to see how far this goes.  Would be wonderful if only... <sigh>
